jv_history.source_quote: Piver is the _New York Times_ best-selling author of 9 books, a speaker, and founder of the largest virtual mindfulness community in the world, The Open Heart Project. She has been featured on Oprah,

what_you_do: I am a transformational mentor, intuitive, teacher, author, healer, guide – here to serve you for your evolving expansion.
who_you_serve: The human experience is a wild ride, yet our challenges have the potential to bring us to the doorway of ever-greater expansion, and then walk through it.
social_proof: Susan is one of the most compassionate, masterful and wise teacher's I have ever had the pleasure of working with.
